text: Woh tumhein khud tumhari apni hi zaat se ek misal deta hai. Kya tumhare un ghulaamo mein se jo tumhari milkiyat mein hain kuch ghulam aisey bhi hain jo hamare diye huey maal o daulat mein tumhare saath barabar ke shareek hon aur tum unsey us tarah darte ho jis tarah aapas mein apne humsaron (each other)se darte ho? Is tarah hum aayaat khol kar pesh karte hain un logon ke liye jo aqal se kaam letay hain
